article_title: Blue Cross CEO says insurer may leave ACA market in NC in 2017
article_text:
NC’s largest insurer braces for second consecutive financial loss

CEO Brad Wilson hints it might stop selling ACA policies in NC

Blue Cross is only insurer offering coverage under ACA in all 100 NC counties

article_metadata.news-keywords: Brad Wilson, ACA, affordable care act, north carolina, obamacare, Blue Cross, Blue Shield
article_metadata.description: Blue Cross and Blue Shield, the state’s largest health insurer, expects to report its second consecutive financial loss in the coming weeks, as the company contends with continuing cost overruns under the Affordable Care Act, CEO Brad Wilson said Wednesday.
